name: Soft Corn Pudding
keywords: corn, milk, pumpkin, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons pumpkin puree, fresh or canned, without sugar
1/2 cup fresh or frozen corn kernels
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put the milk, pumpkin puree, garlic, corn and allspice in a small saucepan and bring to a boil over high heat. Lower the heat to a simmer and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Slowly add the cornmeal while stirring continually. Season with salt, pepper and cayenne. Stir in the butter. Set aside in a warm place.
